Assassins_Slash_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Penetrating_Ray_Quick.help: You take careful aim at your target and deliver a punishing supercharged shot from your Beam Rifle. This causes Extreme Energy damage and may knock the target off their feet. If the target is also suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will also suffer additional damage over time. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect will cause this effect to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
Penetrating_Ray_Quick.shortHelp: Sniper, Extreme Dmg(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

Resistance.help: Carrion Creeper Vines are highly resistant to Toxic and Psionic Damage. They also have a high defense to Psionic Attacks. However, they are otherwise vulnerable to most damage.

Assassins_Eclipse_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior smashing and negative damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Kinetic_Lance_Quick.help: You form the potential energies around you into a lance of energy that you fire at a single target. This lance pierces the target, causing an initial burst of lethal damage that then becomes a smaller lethal damage over time effect. This attack will also build Impulse. When you have at least one stack of Impulse, this power will also reduce the target's damage potential and smashing/energy resistance. This is a sniper attack, but due to your high chance to hit, it is not interruptible. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
Kinetic_Lance_Quick.shortHelp: Sniper, Extreme DMG (Lethal, Energy), Special (Power Amplified)
Kinetic_Lance_Quick.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

Kinetic_Lance_Normal.help: You form the potential energies around you into a lance of energy that you fire at a single target. This lance pierces the target, causing an initial burst of lethal damage that then becomes a smaller lethal damage over time effect. This attack will also build Impulse. When you have at least one stack of Impulse, this power will also reduce the target's damage potential and smashing/energy resistance. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. When used against players in PvP situations, this power will grant additional contribution toward your Domination. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Slow
Kinetic_Lance_Normal.shortHelp: Sniper, Extreme DMG (Lethal, Energy), Special (Power Amplified)
Kinetic_Lance_Normal.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time.

Proton_Volley_Quick.help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Affected enemies have a small chance to be affected by the Contaminated effect. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radioactive Assault powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Proton_Volley_Quick.targetHelp: The Proton Volley has reduced your Defenses.

Assassins_Blades_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous lethal damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. This power is needed for the Empower and Sweep combination attacks. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Resistance.help: The Venus Fly Trap is highly resistant to Smashing, Cold, Energy, Negative, Toxic, and Psionic Damage. It also has a high defense to Psionic Attacks. It is, however unprotected from Fire and Lethal Damage. Its tendency to regrow quickly when damaged also grants it a boosted regeneration rate.

Telekinetic_Blast.help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Assassins_Frost_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous lethal damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. This power is needed for the Empower and Sweep combination attacks. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special

Assassins_Blade_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Assassins_Psi_Blade_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior psionic and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Psi Blade has a good chance to grant Insight if used while not hidden and a very high chance to grant Insight if used while hidden. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Assassins_Strike_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior energy and smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Assassin's Corruption also has a very high chance to inflict Contaminated while hidden and a high chance while unhidden. Hitting Contaminated foes with single target Radiation Melee powers cause a small burst of damage to foes near the target. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Assassins_Impaler_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior lethal damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you impale your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. This power grants one stack of Perfection of Body. Assassins_Strike_Stealth.help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Assassin's Strike builds 2 Combo Levels. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

Claw_Rake.help: The Umbra Beast quickly slashes at its prey causing a minor amount of lethal and negative energy as well as causing the target to bleed for a short amount of time causing a minor amount of lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Claw_Rake.shortHelp: Melee, Minor DMG(Lethal/Negative), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Claw_Rake.targetHelp: You are bleeding from the Umbra Beast's Claw Rake!

Shadowy_Binds.help: You take control of your victim's shadow causing it to entangle and bind its owner thus leaving them immobilized and suffering from negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit. Fast Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Shadowy_Binds.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DOT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Shadowy_Binds.targetHelp: You have been entangled by Shadowy Binds and have been left immobilized.
